name: Pikotaro - I Like OJ - twitter.com
description:
Pikotaro - I Like OJ - twitter.com
v1.0
additional_info: Pikotaro, a fictional singer-songwriter created and portrayed by Japanese comedian Daimaou Kosaka.[1][2] It was released as a music video on YouTube on 25 August 2016, and has since become a viral video. As of January 2017, the official video has been viewed over 110 million times
